name: Office Story
description:
A text-based achievement-flavoured mini-dungeon about infiltrating an office

I made this in a few days for Spring Lisp Game Jam 2020.

I haven't written anything in Lisp (or any functional language) in at least 3 years, but I figured this would be a good occasion to remember the principles. As if it wasn't hard enough, I forced myself not to use any "bang" command (e.g. "set!") at all throughout the code.
